law.text: Any person subject to this code who is guilty of cruelty toward, or oppression or maltreatment of, any person subject to the person's orders shall be punished as a court-martial may direct.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 97, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 56, sec. 71.
